title: How to Make Colored Homemade Waffles
description: Batter up! It’s easy to show your team spirit using Color Right. Easily create your team color with custom QuickCount color formulas made just for your team. Swirl color into waffle batter for delicious waffle dippers made using your team colors.

asset.author: Wilton
asset.description:
Batter up! It’s easy to show your team spirit using Color Right. Easily create your team color with custom QuickCount color formulas made just for your team. Swirl color into waffle batter for delicious waffle dippers made using your team colors.

Get the printable how-to here: http://bit.ly/2fp4NXK
Stay Sweet, Subscribe: http://s.wilton.com/10vmhuv

INGREDIENTS:
- Color Right Food Coloring System: http://bit.ly/2fjIxQl
- Bake Easy Non-Stick Food Spray: http://bit.ly/2fLAVcA
- 1 teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract: http://bit.ly/2fLuCWd
- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 1 tablespoon baking powder
- ¼ teaspoon salt
- 1 ½ cups buttermilk
- 2 Eggs
- ½ cup vegetable oil
